words.prompt: Always. Always brush your teeth before bed. Always.
Around. We walked around the block. Around.
Because. He was happy because he got a present. Because.
Been. Have you ever been to the zoo? Been.
Before. Look both ways before you cross the street. Before.
Best. She tried her best on the test. Best.
Both. Both puppies are cute. Both.
Buy. I need to buy some milk. Buy.
Call. Please call me when you get home. Call.
Cold. It is cold outside today. Cold.
Does. Does the dog want to go out? Does.
Don’t. Don’t forget your lunchbox. Don’t.
Fast. The cheetah can run very fast. Fast.
First. She was the first person in line. First.
Five. I have five fingers on my hand. Five.
Found. He found his lost toy. Found.
Gave. My friend gave me a sticker. Gave.
Goes. The bus goes to the city. Goes.
Green. Grass is usually green. Green.
Its. The dog wagged its tail. Its.
Made. Mom made cookies for us. Made.
Many. There are many stars in the sky. Many.
Off. Please turn off the light. Off.
Or. Do you want juice or water? Or.
Pull. You need to pull the door to open it. Pull.
Read. I like to read books. Read.
Right. Turn right at the corner. Right.
Sing. Let's sing a song together. Sing.
Sit. Please sit down in your chair. Sit.
Sleep. Cats like to sleep a lot. Sleep.
Tell. Can you tell me a story? Tell.
Their. That is their house. Their.
These. These apples are red. These.
Those. Those birds are flying high. Those.
Upon. Once upon a time. Upon.
Us. Will you play with us? Us.
Use. Please use a pencil to write. Use.
Very. It is a very sunny day. Very.
Wash. Remember to wash your hands. Wash.
Which. Which color do you like best? Which.
Why. Why is the sky blue? Why.
Wish. I wish I could fly. Wish.
Work. Dad goes to work every day. Work.
Would. Would you like some help? Would.
Write. Can you write your name? Write.
Your. Is this your backpack? Your.
